meta.description: Fact-based, sourced information about the September 11th attacks. Explore the evidence and make up your own mind about what happened on 9/11.

title: 9/11 Facts: Explore the evidence, make up your own mind
cleaned_text:
9/11, 2001 As It Happened: 8,407,111 views since Sep 9, 2021

The following video is made from news footage and amateur video broadcast or recorded on September 11th, 2001.

 This video is for those too young to remember or those who weren’t born yet who want to try to understand what it was like that day. The extraordinary footage captured by news networks, eyewitnesses and people on the scene is very powerful and emotionally challenging to watch.

Video by Tom Compagnoni.

 8,407,111 views as of 9/22/22

 Sep 9, 2021

After watching click here to peruse the more than 27,365 comments, many from people directly impacted by the attacks.

opengraph.title: 9/11 Facts: Explore the evidence, make up your own mind | 911Truth.Org
